mapper.insert: insert into bd_check (checkid, bt, btys, pclx, pcrw, pfb, fqr, fqsj, shr, shsj, shyj, zt, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag, nr ) values (#{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pclx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcrw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fqsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update bd_check set bt = #{bt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, btys = #{btys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pclx = #{pclx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcrw = #{pcrw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pfb = #{pfb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fqr = #{fqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fqsj = #{fqsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shr = #{shr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shsj = #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shyj = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zt = #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nr = #{nr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where checkid = #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select checkid, bt, btys, pclx, pcrw, pfb, fqr,fn_get_username(fqr) fqrmc, date_format(fqsj, '%Y/%m/%d') fqsj, shr,fn_get_username(shr) shrmc, date_format(shsj, '%Y/%m/%d') shsj, shyj, zt, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag, nr from bd_check where checkid = #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
